q: Has the attacker claimed to have sensitive data or threatened to release private or confidential information publicly?
follow_up: What kind of sensitive data did they claim to have?

q: Did the ransomware attackers leave a ransom note?
follow_up: Was there any specific demand mentioned in the note?

q: Did the attacker provide contact details or methods for further communication, such as email or a number or any other?
follow_up: What method of contact was provided?

q: Was a specific payment method requested (e.g., cryptocurrency, bank transfer, personal meet)?
Have you noticed any unusual behavior or activity on your devices after the incident?
follow_up: Can you describe the unusual behavior?

q: Was any security software installed before the attack occurred?
follow_up: Was the software up to date and actively running?

q: Is the device part of a larger network (e.g., corporate network)?
follow_up: Have other devices in the network shown signs of being affected?

q: Do you suspect any malicious emails, websites, or files might have led to the ransomware attack?
follow_up: Do you recall which email, website, or file it could be?

q: Have you made any changes to your security settings or systems following the attack?
